projectGridLines.title: Flow Manager (Physical Design RTL2GDS Flow) & Product validation
projectGridLines.description:
In house Physical design flow for supporting IP Hardening, Validation on products. Flow

supports based on product requirements for advanced nodes like 3nm, 5nm etc (including various

foundry process). The internship also includes validation of proteanTecs Implementation solution, in

Flow Manager, before release using complex test-designs on advanced nodes

Skill sets: Knowledge in VLSI Design flow (including Physical Design), STA, TCL/Shell basic coding.

Traits expectation: Problem solving, curious, critical thinking, debugging.

Expected learning: Will learn on physical design aspect of chip designing (RTL2GDS), flow

methodology, challenges associated with advanced nodes and Industry approach of solving.

Specific courses required for project execution: VLSI flow, small scripting background (for further

ramp-up, Training will be provided in house by experts/mentors)

projectGridLines.title: Electronic Design Automation (EDA) for Proteantecs’ solutions
projectGridLines.description:
This involves testing the new world-class cutting-edge algorithms,

developing automations for complex tasks and VLSI design analysis. The role will train

the candidate for an in-depth analysis of VLSI design while exposing the person to

writing complex code.

Skill sets: Knowledge on VLSI design, Algorithms & Data Structures

Traits expectation: Team player, communication skills

Expected learning: Industry standard tools usage, building automation around tools,

testing Proteantecs’ tools.

Specific courses required for project execution: VLSI design, Algorithms and Data

Structures, Python basics.

projectGridLines.title: BI Automation and Monitoring system developer
projectGridLines.description:
Development, and maintenance of an automation system designed to ensure the

quality of BI dashboards

Skill sets: Python, SW design, Tableau, Git, GitHub, GitHub actions, Grafana, SQL, Kubernetes,

Nuclio

Traits expectation: Problem solving, curious, critical thinking, organized, debugging

Expected learning: Will learn on SW design, testing methodologies, version control practices, SW

development and monitoring on cloud environments. Also on BI tools and practices, and introduction

to chip design, manufacturing, and testing.

Specific courses required for project execution: SW design, Python fundamentals, Git.

projectGridLines.title: Title: Machine Learning Operational and Quality Engineer
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Machine Learning Operational and Quality Engineer

Description: Develop and maintain of machine learning infrastructure and quality automation

Skill sets: Python, SW design, Git, Github actions, Kubernetes, microservices, rabbit MQ, Playwrite, Graphana, cloud environment, MySQL, Redis,  SW development methodologies, MLRun or other Machine Learning infrastructure.

Traits expectation: Highly motivated, problem solver, fast learner, communicative, ability to understand complex systems, quality oriented.

Expected learning: OOS programming in Python, microservice and Kubernetes architecture, git-actions, Playtests and testing tools, basic machine learning, automations, continues integration

Specific courses required for project execution: Python, object oriented programming, statistics
